entry.name: WinCriticalServices
entry.description: Monitors state of common Windows Services critical to business operation.

datapoint.name: State
datapoint.alertbody: The Windows service ##INSTANCE## ##DSIDESCRIPTION## on ##HOST## is not running. This started at ##START## - or ##DURATION## ago.

datapoint.name: RunningStatus
datapoint.alertbody: The windows service ##INSTANCE## ##DSIDESCRIPTION## on ##HOST## is running, but not in the OK state. It may be in error, degraded or starting/stoppingstate. This started at ##START## - or ##DURATION## ago.
datapoint.description: If service is running, alert if Status is not OK.
